name: Motivational Hero Vol. 2
description:
Motivational Hero is a Emotional and Motivational Puzzle-Platformer 2d with levels based in Motivational Analogies with a dinamic procedural color pallete system

Features

  • 16 Levels inspired in motivational messages
  • A cheap and fast game that can be beated in a few minutes depending of your level skills
  • Relaxing, Motivational and Inspiring
  • Procedural Color Pallete System, each level and each try have a random pallete


Relaxing Gameplay


Analogies in every stage


Maniac for Buttons


Procedural Pallete System
